title: 103_hr661
content: Gun Violence Economic Equity Act of 1993 - Provides that any person suffering bodily injury or death as a result of the discharge of a handgun or an assault weapon may bring an action in US district court against any manufacturer, importer, or dealer of a handgun or assault weapon. Makes such defendants strictly liable for all direct and consequential damages that arise from such bodily injury or death, except when the injury: (1) is suffered while committing a felony, (2) is self-inflicted. Or (3) is a result of a discharge by a law enforcement officer or a member of the armed forces in the line of duty.
